DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Launches one homing torpedo at a target entity. The torpedo moves straight at the given bearing for a given distance, then moves toward the target. The torpedo moves at a specified depth, and explodes when it is within the given proximity of the target.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetEntity</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target Entity:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The target (ship)</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>All Surface</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllSurfaceFilter;DtAllSubsurfaceFilter;DtAllEntitiesFilter;DtAllSurfaceByForceFilter;DtAllSubsurfaceByForceFilter;DtAllEntitiesByForceFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>initialBearing</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Initial bearing</myLabel> <myToolTip>The bearing (from the launch platform) on which the torpedo moves before turning toward the target.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-6.2831853071795862</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>homingDelay</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Homing Start Delay</myLabel> <myToolTip>Distance torpedo travels along initial bearing before turning toward target.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1000</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>40000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>cruiseDepth</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Cruise Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Torpedo cruise depth; distance below surface.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>5</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>1000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>proximityTrigger</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Proximity Trigger Distance</myLabel> <myToolTip>Distance to target that triggers detonation. Use 0 to require impact for detonation.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>6</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>parentLauncher</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Parent platform that launched torpedo</myLabel> <myToolTip>Parent platform</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>-</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
